# HairBook - Hair Salon Management System

## Project Status
- [x] Create project structure
- [x] Setup Prisma database

- [x] Implement materials section
- [x] Create settings

## Project Overview
Modern hair salon management application built with Next.js 14, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and Prisma.

### Key Features
- Authentication with first-time setup
- Master-detail layout with sidebar navigation
- Client management with groups and avatars
- POS-style visit screen for services
- Material inventory with unit conversion (g, ml, ks)
- Visit states: saved (editable) and closed (locked with material deduction)

### Tech Stack
- Next.js 14 with App Router
- TypeScript
- Tailwind CSS
- shadcn/ui components
- Prisma ORM
- SQLite database
